channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management

item.title: CVE-2019-4249|2024-08-04T19:33:37.951Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 159647.

item.title: CVE-2019-4083|2024-08-04T19:26:27.969Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 157383.

item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. item.title: CVE-2019-4252|2024-08-04T19:33:37.934Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 159883.

item.title: CVE-2019-4250|2024-08-04T19:33:37.595Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management

IBM X-Force ID: 159648.

item.title: CVE-2019-4084|2024-08-04T19:26:28.010Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1) could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from CLM Applications that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 157384.
